The chunk provides an example of initializing a `DirectScrolledList` widget in Panda3D, demonstrating the creation of buttons and labels, followed by configuring the scroll list with specific button positions, text, scaling, and styling.

b1 = DirectButton(text=("Button1", "click!", "roll", "disabled"),
                  text_scale=0.1, borderWidth=(0.01, 0.01),
                  relief=2)

b2 = DirectButton(text=("Button2", "click!", "roll", "disabled"),
                  text_scale=0.1, borderWidth=(0.01, 0.01),
                  relief=2)

l1 = DirectLabel(text="Test1", text_scale=0.1)
l2 = DirectLabel(text="Test2", text_scale=0.1)
l3 = DirectLabel(text="Test3", text_scale=0.1)

numItemsVisible = 4
itemHeight = 0.11

myScrolledList = DirectScrolledList(
    decButton_pos=(0.35, 0, 0.53),
    decButton_text="Dec",
    decButton_text_scale=0.04,
    decButton_borderWidth=(0.005, 0.005),

    incButton_pos=(0.35, 0, -0.02),
    incButton_text="Inc",
    incButton_text_scale=0.04,
    incButton_borderWidth=(0.005, 0.005),
